title: Physics Learning Motivation Improvement Program Based on Historical Scientific Narratives

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic physics concepts at the high school level
context.additional_context: In VR simulation environments, explores physics concepts centered on free-fall motion using historical science narratives. Conducts activity-based classes utilizing learners' personal smart devices

learning_goals: Enable over 80% of learners to explain the basic principles of free-fall motion through historical scientific narrative analysis
Achieve a 20%+ increase in average scores of the experimental group compared to the control group in learning motivation surveys
Facilitate collaborative scientific problem-solving processes in VR simulation activities for over 90% of learners

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Supported App

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
